tools.name: CreatePresentation

Create a new PowerPoint presentation in OneDrive.

The presentation will be created with a title slide containing the specified title.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title for the new presentation.

parameters.name: parent_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder to create the presentation in. If not provided, the presentation will be created in the root of the user's OneDrive.

tools.name: CreateSlide
tools.description:
Append a new slide to the end of an existing PowerPoint presentation in OneDrive.

The slide will be added at the end of the presentation. Both title and body
are optional to support layouts like BLANK or TITLE_ONLY.

For presentations larger than 4 MB, the upload uses a resumable session.
Concurrency protection (etag check) is best-effort in that case, since
Microsoft Graph upload sessions do not support If-Match headers.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the PowerPoint presentation to add a slide to.

parameters.name: slide_title
parameters.description: The title for the new slide. Optional for layouts like BLANK.

parameters.name: slide_body
parameters.description: The body content for the new slide. Supports markdown: **bold**, *italic*, __underline__, and bullet points (- item, indented with spaces for nesting). Optional for layouts like TITLE_ONLY or BLANK.

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: The layout to use for the slide. For TWO_CONTENT layout, use create_two_content_slide.

output.description: The updated presentation details with new slide info.

documentationChunks.content:
## Overview

Arcade.dev LLM tools for Microsoft PowerPoint enable programmatic creation, modification, and extraction of PowerPoint presentations stored in OneDrive via Microsoft Graph. Use these tools to create slides and presentations, manage speaker notes in markdown, export presentation content as markdown, and perform user-context queries.

**Capabilities**
- Create a new presentation and append slides (including TWO_CONTENT layouts) in OneDrive.
- Read, set, and batch-retrieve speaker notes; notes are handled and returned in markdown with basic formatting preserved.
- Export a presentation to a markdown representation that preserves text, tables, and chart data; media are represented as placeholders.
- Handle large uploads using Microsoft Graph resumable sessions; concurrency protection (etag) is best-effort for uploads >4 MB.
- Retrieve user and environment information (WhoAmI) to inform operations and personalization.

**OAuth**
Provider: microsoft
Scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read
Access tokens authorize operations on PowerPoint files in the user's OneDrive via Microsoft Graph.

summary:
Microsoft PowerPoint provider using Microsoft Graph. This Arcade toolkit lets LLMs create, read, and modify PowerPoint presentations stored in OneDrive, managing slides, layouts, notes, and exports.

**Capabilities**
- Create and update presentations and slide layouts (including multi-content layouts) and append slides programmatically.
- Read, set, and bulk-extract speaker notes in Markdown with basic formatting preserved.
- Export presentation content to Markdown (text, tables, chart data) with media placeholders.
- Robust file handling: resumable uploads for >4MB files and best-effort concurrency via etags.
- Query user context and presentation metadata.

**OAuth**
Provider: microsoft
Scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read
